analytic.title: This paper was originally prepared for the OECD Economic Survey of the United States under the authority of the Economic and Development Review Committee. The annex to the working paper is one of the technical background papers. The author thanks Peter Borkey

monogr.title: and Rob Youngman for their comments and suggestions. Special thanks go to Valery Dugain for research and Heloise Wickramanayake for assistance in preparing the document
